entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: Seamus Finnigan is mentioned as reacting to the sound of an egg slamming shut.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as slamming the egg shut and being advised by others on what might have caused the sound.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as reacting to the sound of someone being tortured and advising Harry on how to fight the Cruciatus Curse.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as advising Neville not to fight the Cruciatus Curse and suggesting an alternative way for Harry to attack Percy.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as being compared to a sound that might have caused the noise.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as offering Hermione a jam tart and joking about the custard creams.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as looking doubtfully at the plate of treats offered by Fred.

relationships.description: Neville advises Harry that he will have to fight the Cruciatus Curse.
George compares Percy's singing to a sound that might have caused the noise.
Fred offers Hermione a jam tart.
